page.title: 09The School System
page.content: This area has the Staffordshire County Council as its local Education Authority. It is a two-tier system, with primary schools for the 5-11 year age-group and secondary schools for the 11-16 year olds. Those wishing to continue their education beyond the statutory minimum but travel into Newcastle-under-Lyme or Stoke to a college of further education or tertiary college. Although there is only one secondary school within this Domesday Project block, the Primary Schools from the east of Apedale, in fact those who have contributed to this database, do not send their pupils on to Chesterton High School, but to a neighbouring one since they are not in the same "catchment area".
